entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries early this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High zero.
